title: Frequently Asked Questions
subtitle: Find answers to common questions about LUMORA

faqs.question: How do I set up the LUMORA smart lamp?
faqs.answer:
Simply download the LUMORA app, plug in your lamp, and follow the in-app setup guide. The process takes less than 5 minutes and includes automatic Wi-Fi pairing.

Step-by-step:

  1. Download the LUMORA app from App Store or Google Play
  2. Create an account or sign in
  3. Plug in your lamp and turn it on
  4. Follow the in-app instructions to connect

faqs.question: What smart home systems are compatible?
faqs.answer:
LUMORA is compatible with:

  • Amazon Alexa (Echo, Dot, Show)
  • Google Assistant (Nest Hub, Home, Mini)
  • Apple HomeKit (iPhone, iPad, HomePod)
  • Samsung SmartThings
  • IFTTT for advanced automation

Works with both iOS and Android devices.

faqs.question: What is the warranty period?
faqs.answer:
We offer a comprehensive 2-year warranty covering all electronic components and manufacturing defects. LED lifespan is guaranteed for 50,000 hours.

The warranty covers:

  • Electronic components
  • LED light source
  • Power adapter
  • Manufacturing defects

Does not cover physical damage or normal wear and tear.

faqs.question: Do you offer cash on delivery in Pakistan?
faqs.answer:
Yes! We offer cash on delivery across major cities in Pakistan including:

  • Karachi
  • Lahore
  • Islamabad
  • Rawalpindi
  • Faisalabad
  • Multan
  • And more...

Delivery typically takes 2-3 business days. Free shipping on orders over PKR 5000.
